trans-unit.source: Serializes or deserializes an object, or an entire graph of connected objects, to or from the body of a Message Queuing message, using a binary format.
trans-unit.target: 使用二進位格式將訊息佇列訊息的主體序列化或還原序列化物件，或連接物件的整個圖解。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Messaging.BinaryMessageFormatter> is very efficient and can be used to serialize most objects.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.BinaryMessageFormatter>非常有效率，而且可用來序列化大部分的物件。

trans-unit.source: The result is very compact and fast to parse, but does not allow for loosely coupled messaging as the <xref:System.Messaging.XmlMessageFormatter> does.
trans-unit.target: 結果是相當精簡且快速剖析的但並不允許鬆散偶合的傳訊為<xref:System.Messaging.XmlMessageFormatter>沒有。

trans-unit.source: Loosely coupled means that the client and the server can independently version the type that is sent and received.
trans-unit.target: 鬆散偶合的方式，用戶端和伺服器可以獨立版本傳送和接收的類型。

trans-unit.source: When the application sends a message to the queue using an instance of the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue> class, the formatter serializes the object into a stream and inserts it into the message body.
trans-unit.target: 當應用程式會傳送訊息至佇列使用的執行個體<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue>類別，格式器會將物件序列化成資料流，並將它插入訊息內文。

trans-unit.source: When reading from a queue using a <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue>, the formatter deserializes the message data into the <xref:System.Messaging.Message.Body%2A> property of a <xref:System.Messaging.Message>.
trans-unit.target: 讀取佇列使用時<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue>，格式子還原序列化成訊息資料<xref:System.Messaging.Message.Body%2A>屬性<xref:System.Messaging.Message>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Messaging.BinaryMessageFormatter> provides faster throughput than the <xref:System.Messaging.XmlMessageFormatter>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.BinaryMessageFormatter> 提供更快速的輸送量比<xref:System.Messaging.XmlMessageFormatter>。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Messaging.BinaryMessageFormatter> when pure speed rather than loosely coupled messaging is desired.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Messaging.BinaryMessageFormatter>當純速度而不是鬆散偶合的傳訊想要使用。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Messaging.BinaryMessageFormatter" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Messaging.BinaryMessageFormatter" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Messaging.BinaryMessageFormatter" /> class without specifying a type style or top object assembly style.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Messaging.BinaryMessageFormatter" /> 類別的新執行個體，而不指定型別樣式或最上層物件組件樣式。

trans-unit.source: You must specify values for the <xref:System.Messaging.BinaryMessageFormatter.TopObjectFormat%2A> property (which defines how the root object in a graph is laid out) and the <xref:System.Messaging.BinaryMessageFormatter.TypeFormat%2A> property (which defines how object type descriptions are laid out) before using an instance of the <xref:System.Messaging.BinaryMessageFormatter> class to serialize and send a message.
trans-unit.target: 您必須指定的值<xref:System.Messaging.BinaryMessageFormatter.TopObjectFormat%2A>屬性 （會定義在圖形中的根物件的配置方式） 和<xref:System.Messaging.BinaryMessageFormatter.TypeFormat%2A>屬性 （會定義物件的類型描述的配置方式） 使用的執行個體之前<xref:System.Messaging.BinaryMessageFormatter>類別序列化並傳送訊息。

trans-unit.source: Determines how the top (root) object of a graph is laid out in the serialized stream.
trans-unit.target: 決定如何在序列資料流中配置圖形的上層 (根) 物件。

trans-unit.source: Determines how type descriptions are laid out in the serialized stream.
trans-unit.target: 決定如何在序列資料流中配置型別描述。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Messaging.BinaryMessageFormatter" /> class, specifying the formats of the root object and the type descriptions.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Messaging.BinaryMessageFormatter" /> 類別的新執行個體，指定根物件和型別描述的格式。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Messaging.Message" /> to inspect.
trans-unit.target: 要檢查的 <see cref="T:System.Messaging.Message" />。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the formatter can deserialize the contents of the message.
trans-unit.target: 決定格式子是否能夠還原序列化訊息的內容。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the binary message formatter can deserialize the message; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果二進位訊息格式子可以將訊息還原序列化，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Messaging.BinaryMessageFormatter.CanRead%2A> returns `false` if the message body is not a binary object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.BinaryMessageFormatter.CanRead%2A> 傳回`false`如果訊息本文不是二進位物件。

trans-unit.source: On the receiving computer, <xref:System.Messaging.BinaryMessageFormatter.CanRead%2A> returns `true` if the assembly for the class to be deserialized exists locally.
trans-unit.target: 在接收端電腦上，<xref:System.Messaging.BinaryMessageFormatter.CanRead%2A>傳回`true`如果要還原序列化類別的組件存在於本機。

trans-unit.source: The assembly must be found in the global assembly cache, or be linked to the application (for example, if the object represents a custom class).
trans-unit.target: 組件必須位於全域組件快取中，或連結至應用程式 （例如，如果自訂類別所代表的物件）。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="message" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="message" /> 參數為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Messaging.BinaryMessageFormatter" /> class whose read/write properties (the root object and type description formats) are the same as the current <see cref="T:System.Messaging.BinaryMessageFormatter" />.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.Messaging.BinaryMessageFormatter" /> 類別的執行個體，其讀取/寫入屬性 (根物件和型別描述格式) 和目前的 <see cref="T:System.Messaging.BinaryMessageFormatter" /> 相同。

trans-unit.source: An object whose properties are identical to those of this <see cref="T:System.Messaging.BinaryMessageFormatter" />, but whose metadata does not specify it to be a formatter class instance.
trans-unit.target: 物件，其屬性和這個 <see cref="T:System.Messaging.BinaryMessageFormatter" /> 的屬性相同，但是其中繼資料 (Metadata) 沒有指定它為格式子類別執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This method creates a copy of the formatter and initializes all its properties to the values of this <xref:System.Messaging.BinaryMessageFormatter>.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會建立此格式子的複本，並初始化其所有屬性的值<xref:System.Messaging.BinaryMessageFormatter>。

trans-unit.source: It is used for scalability, but does not guarantee read or write thread safety.
trans-unit.target: 用於擴充性，但不保證讀取或寫入執行緒安全。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Messaging.Message" />, in binary format, to deserialize.
trans-unit.target: 要還原序列化的 <see cref="T:System.Messaging.Message" />，格式為二進位格式。

trans-unit.source: Reads the contents from the given message and creates an object that contains the deserialized message.
trans-unit.target: 讀取指定訊息的內容，並建立包含還原序列化訊息的物件。

trans-unit.source: The deserialized message.
trans-unit.target: 還原序列化的訊息。

trans-unit.source: Calling this method with untrusted data is a security risk.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫此方法不受信任的資料時，會造成安全性風險。

trans-unit.source: Call this method only with trusted data.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫這個方法僅使用信任的資料。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Data Validation](https://www.owasp.org/index.php/Data_Validation).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[資料驗證](https://www.owasp.org/index.php/Data_Validation)。

trans-unit.source: The body of the message must be in binary format, and the same serializer must be used to deserialize the message as that which initially serialized it.
trans-unit.target: 訊息的主體必須是以二進位格式，而且必須使用相同的序列化程式來還原序列化開始序列化它的訊息。

trans-unit.source: If the body represents a custom class, the assembly for that class must exist locally.
trans-unit.target: 如果主體代表自訂類別，該類別的組件必須存在於本機。

trans-unit.source: The message's <see cref="P:System.Messaging.Message.BodyType" /> property does not indicate a binary object.
trans-unit.target: 訊息的 <see cref="P:System.Messaging.Message.BodyType" /> 屬性不是一個二進位物件。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="message" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="message" /> 參數為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that defines how the top (root) object of a graph is deserialized with regards to finding and loading its assembly.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，定義在尋找和載入圖形之最上層 (根) 物件的組件時還原序列化它的方式。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.FormatterAssemblyStyle" /> values that defines the deserialization behavior.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.FormatterAssemblyStyle" /> 值，定義還原序列化 (Deserialization) 行為。

trans-unit.source: Currently, you should accept the default value, `AssemblyStyle`.
trans-unit.target: 目前，您應接受預設值， `AssemblyStyle`。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that defines how type descriptions are laid out in the serialized stream.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定數值，定義如何在序列資料流中配置型別描述。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.FormatterTypeStyle" /> that defines the type description format.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.FormatterTypeStyle" />，定義型別描述的格式。

trans-unit.source: Currently, you should accept the default value, `TypesWhenNeeded`.
trans-unit.target: 目前，您應接受預設值， `TypesWhenNeeded`。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Messaging.Message" /> whose <see cref="P:System.Messaging.Message.Body" /> property will contain the serialized object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Messaging.Message" />，其 <see cref="P:System.Messaging.Message.Body" /> 屬性會包含序列化物件。

trans-unit.source: The object to be serialized into the message body.
trans-unit.target: 要序列化到訊息本文中的物件。

trans-unit.source: Serializes an object into the body of the message.
trans-unit.target: 將物件序列化到訊息主體中。

trans-unit.source: The top object format and type format need not be specified to write to the queue as they must be when reading.
trans-unit.target: 最上層物件的格式和型別格式不需要指定讀取時，它們必須是寫入至佇列。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Messaging.BinaryMessageFormatter.TopObjectFormat%2A> and <xref:System.Messaging.BinaryMessageFormatter.TypeFormat%2A> properties are used by the formatter only when deserializing a message.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.BinaryMessageFormatter.TopObjectFormat%2A>和<xref:System.Messaging.BinaryMessageFormatter.TypeFormat%2A>屬性時，使用格式器只能還原序列化訊息。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Messaging.BinaryMessageFormatter> can serialize most objects, but the result is not loosely coupled.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.BinaryMessageFormatter>可以序列化大部分的物件，但不鬆散耦合的結果。

trans-unit.source: However, it is compact, so the formatter is efficient for large objects.
trans-unit.target: 不過，它是壓縮，因此格式器是大型物件時很有效率。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="message" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="message" /> 參數為 <see langword="null" />。
